hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.description: Software developer passionate about creating elegant and functional solutions.

description.p1: I'm a software developer with experience in building web and mobile applications. I'm passionate about creating elegant and functional solutions that solve real-world problems.
description.p2: My focus is on writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code using best practices and design patterns. I'm always learning new technologies and improving my skills.

projects.name: Jukeis Desktop App
projects.description: Almacenamiento de claves de forma encriptada local y en Google Drive

jobs.title: Backend Developer - Node.js
jobs.description: I worked as an Advanced Backend Developer at Distillery, supporting a client (RabbitMx) from Mexico. I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, maintainable code and contributed to the continuous improvement of our development workflows. It was a big challenge working within RabbitMx because they have over 250k customers, and the daily experience was thrilling. I mainly worked on two types of projects: serverless and monolith projects with NestJS. The main coding languages used were JavaScript and TypeScript.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: I worked with two teams at OV Loop: the Messaging and Payments teams. In the first, I worked as a Node.js developer mainly using Express.js and DynamoDB, working with various microservices to store and manage data from native mobile apps and web clients. Later, I joined the Payments team, where I learned a lot about payment and billing business logic and product development.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: I had the opportunity to work for an important organization within LVI in CÃ³rdoba, Argentina. At LVI, I learned the Laravel framework for PHP and refreshed my skills in the language.

jobs.title: Mobile iOS Developer, Node.js
jobs.description: Webee is an IoT company. Working there was very interesting and exciting. I had the opportunity to work with great colleagues and learned a lot about electronics, low-level programming, and various types of electronic communication protocols such as ZigBee and HTTP schemes for secure data messaging.

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description: I had the opportunity to work with a highly skilled team of developers and met amazing people. My role at Elipsys was to develop an Android application using the Clover SDK for Android. I was responsible for the design, architecture, and programming of the system.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer PHP/JavaScript
jobs.description: I worked as a Fullstack Developer at Ellecktra helping develop new projects using JavaScript (jQuery) and PHP, as well as mobile development using PhoneGap.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer PHP/JavaScript
jobs.description: This was my first professional experience working for different clients in Argentina and Europe. My role there was as a junior web developer. I worked with the technologies of the time (PHP, standard JavaScript, and occasionally the jQuery library). I learned a lot about programming codebases and web design with CSS and media queries.
